title: Comments API
content:
This topic describes how to use the Comments API to add, modify, or remove comments from records.

Add a single comment

Use this API to add a single comment to a record. The API returns the unique ID generated for the new comment. To add more than one comment to a record, see the section on Add multiple comments.

Request URI: https://<serverAddress>/rest/<tenant-id>/collaboration/comments/<EntityType>/<EntityId>

Method: POST

Path parameters:

  • <EntityType>: Specifies the record type.
  • <EntityId>: Specifies the required record.

Request body parameters:

  • Body: The comment text. 
  • PrivacyType: The privacy scope of the comment. Valid values are AGENTPUBLIC, INTERNAL, PUBLIC.
    • Submitter:
      • UserId: ID of the user who submitted the comment.
  • ActualInterface: Valid values are API, API, EMAIL, ESS, SAW, SYSTEM.
  • CommentFrom: Valid values are Agent, ExternalServiceDesk, SocialUser, System, User, User, Vendor.
  • CommentTo: Valid values are Agent, ExternalServiceDesk, Stakeholder, User, Vendor.
  • FunctionalPurpose: Valid values are Diagnosis, EndUserComment, FollowUp, ProvideInformation, RequestMoreInformation, Resolution, ResolutionActivity, StatusUpdate.
  • Media:  Valid values are Email, Fax, InstantMessage, InternalChat, Phone, UI, Unknown.

Response body parameters:

  • Body: The comment text.
  • CreateTime: Auto-generated timestamp of when the comment was added (epoch milliseconds format). For example, 1452751016929. This value will not change.
  • UpdateTime: Auto-generated timestamp of the latest comment update (epoch milliseconds format). Automatically refreshed with each edit. Set to 0 for newly added comments.
  • Id: Unique ID of the newly added comment. Once generated, it remains unchanged. For example, 4e384ac9dade100604e4e1a55466e20931ac.

See the following JSON request and response body examples:

  • JSON request body example: 
    {
  "IsSystem": false,
  "Body": "This is a new comment!",
  "AttachmentIds": [],
  "PrivacyType": "PUBLIC",
  "Submitter": {
    "UserId": "10016"
  },
  "ActualInterface": "SAW",
  "CommentFrom": "User",
  "CommentTo": "",
  "FunctionalPurpose": "EndUserComment",
  "Media": "UI"
}
  • JSON response body example: 
    {
  "IsSystem": false,
  "Body": "This is a new comment!",
  "PrivacyType": "PUBLIC",
  "Submitter": {
    "UserId": "10016"
  },
  "ActualInterface": "SAW",
  "CommentFrom": "User",
  "FunctionalPurpose": "EndUserComment",
  "Media": "UI",
  "CreateTime": 1452751016929,
  "UpdateTime": 0,
  "Id": "4e384ac9dade100604e4e1a55466e20931ac"
}

Add multiple comments

Use this API to add multiple comments to a record. A unique ID is generated for the new comment. Once generated, this ID will not change. To add a single comment to a record, see the section on Add a single comment.

Request URI: https://<serverAddress>/rest/<tenant-id>/collaboration/comments/bulk/<EntityType>/<EntityId>

Method: POST

Path parameters:

  • <EntityType>: Specifies the record type.
  • <EntityId>: Specifies the required record.

Request body parameters: The request body includes an array of JSONs. Each array element contains a comment and its details. For the request body parameters details, see the Request body parameters listed under the  Add a single comment section.

Response body parameters: No response body is returned for this request.

See the following JSON request body example:

[
{
        "IsSystem": false,
        "Body": "This is a new comment!",
        "AttachmentIds": [],
        "PrivacyType": "PUBLIC",
        "Submitter": {
                "UserId": "10016"
        },
        "ActualInterface": "SAW",
        "CommentFrom": "User",
        "CommentTo": "",                    
        "FunctionalPurpose": "EndUserComment",
        "Media": "UI"                   
},
{
        "IsSystem": false,
        "Body": "This is comment2!",
        "AttachmentIds": [],
        "PrivacyType": "PUBLIC", 
        "Submitter": {
                "UserId": "10016"
        },
        "ActualInterface": "SAW", 
        "CommentFrom": "User",
        "CommentTo": "",  
        "FunctionalPurpose": "ProvideInformation",  
        "Media": "UI"  
}
]

Get comments

Use this API to get all the comments from a record.

Request URI: https://<serverAddress>/rest/<tenant-id>/collaboration/comments/<EntityType>/<EntityId>[?PrivacyType=<value>]

Method: GET

Path parameters:

  • <EntityType>: Specifies the record type.
  • <EntityId>: Specifies the required record.

Query parameters:

  • PrivacyType: This is an optional parameter. Specifies the comment type. Valid values are PUBLIC, INTERNAL, AGENTPUBLIC. For example, the following request retrieves all public comments:

rest/<tenant>/collaboration/comments/<EntityType>/<EntityId>?PrivacyType=PUBLIC

Request body parameters: Request body is not applicable to this request.

Response body parameters: The response is an array of JSONs that include the comments posted to the specified record.

  • Body: The comment text.
  • CreateTime: Auto-generated timestamp of when the comment was added (epoch milliseconds format). For example, 1452751016929. This value will not change.
  • UpdateTime: Auto-generated timestamp of the latest comment update (epoch milliseconds format). Automatically refreshed with each edit. Set to 0 for newly added comments.
  • Id: Unique ID of the comment. Once generated, it remains unchanged. For example, 4e384ac9dade100604e4e1a55466e20931ac.

See the following JSON response body example:

[
{
        "IsSystem": false,
        "Body": "This is a new comment2!",
        "AttachmentIds": [],
        "PrivacyType": "PUBLIC",
        "Submitter": {
                "UserId": "10016"
        },
        "ActualInterface": "SAW",
        "CommentFrom": "User",
        "CommentTo": "Agent",
        "FunctionalPurpose": "EndUserComment",
        "Media": "UI",
        "CreateTime": 1754054378517,
        "UpdateTime": 0,
        "Id": "4e384ac9dade100604e4e1a55466e20931ac"
},
{
        "IsSystem": false,
        "Body": "This is a response to comment2!",
        "AttachmentIds": [],
        "PrivacyType": "PUBLIC",
        "Submitter": {
                "UserId": "98861"
        },
        "ActualInterface": "SAW",
        "CommentFrom": "Agent",
        "CommentTo": "User",
        "FunctionalPurpose": "StatusUpdate",
        "Media": "UI",
        "CreateTime": 1754054378517,
        "UpdateTime": 0,
        "Id": "ed5de659626da826e7372ba656de1283efdb17b3"
}
]

Get a single comment

Use this API to get a specific comment from a record. To use this API, you must know the comment ID. The value of the comment ID is returned by the API when the comment is first added to a record.

Request URI: https://<serverAddress>/rest/<tenant-id>/collaboration/comments/<EntityType>/<EntityId>/<CommentId>

Method: GET

Path parameters:

  • <EntityType>: Specifies the record type.
  • <EntityId>: Specifies the required record.
  • <CommentId>: The ID of the comment to retrieve.

Response body parameters: Request body is not applicable to this request.

Response body parameters: The response is a JSON that include the specified comment ID's details. For response body parameter details, see the JSON response body example under Get comments section.

See the following JSON response body example:

{
"IsSystem": false,
"Body": "This is a new comment!",
"PrivacyType": "PUBLIC",
"Submitter": {
"UserId": "10016"
},
"ActualInterface": "SAW",
"CommentFrom": "User",
"FunctionalPurpose": "EndUserUpdate",
"Media": "UI",
"CreateTime": 1754054378517,
"UpdateTime": 0,
"Id": "ed5de659626da826e7372ba656de1283efdb17b3"
}

Get comments with anonymous agent info

Use this API to retrieve comments while ensuring the anonymous agent is included in the response.

Request URI: https://<serverAddress>/rest/<tenant-id>/collaboration/comments/<EntityType>/<EntityId>/WithAnonymousAgentInfo[?PrivacyType=<value>]

Method: GET

Path parameters:

  • <EntityType>: Specifies the record type.
  • <EntityId>: Specifies the required record.
  • WithAnonymousAgentInfo: Specifies the inclusion of anonymous agent information.

Query parameters:

  • PrivacyType: This is an optional parameter. Specifies the privacy type. Valid values are AGENTPUBLIC, INTERNAL, PUBLIC, PUBLIC. 

    If the Enable agent anonymity setting is set to On for the tenant, and the user running the API does not have login authorization, then when the privacy type is AGENTPUBLIC, the submitter's ID is hidden. A false ID of -9999 is returned instead. For example, the following request retrieves all anonymous agent comments within the AGENTPUBLIC privacy scope:

rest/<tenant>/collaboration/comments/<EntityType>/<EntityId>/WithAnonymousAgentInfo?PrivacyType=AGENTPUBLIC

Response body parameters: Request body is not applicable to this request.

Response body parameters: The response is an array of JSONs that include comments posted by anonymous agents to the specified record. For the request body parameters details. see the JSON response body example under Get comments section.

Update a comment

Use this API to update a specific comment in a record. To use this API, you must know the comment ID. The value of the comment ID is returned by the API when the comment is first added to a record.

  • To update existing comments of a record, you must have Comments permission for the relevant record type.
  • The Comments API does not support simultaneous updates. If two update calls are made simultaneously, both will return Success, however, the results are unpredictable.

Request URI: https://<serverAddress>/rest/<tenant-id>/collaboration/comments/<EntityType>/<EntityId>/<CommentId>

Method: PUT

Path parameters:

  • <EntityType>: Specifies the record type.
  • <EntityId>: Specifies the required record.
  • <CommentId>: The ID of the comment to update.

Request body parameters: 

  • Body: The updated comment text.

Response body parameters: The response is a JSON that includes the modified comment, who modified it and the time of modification. 

  • Body: The updated comment text.
  • UpdatedBy:
    • UserId: ID of the user who updated the comment.
  • UpdateTime: Auto-generated timestamp of the latest comment update (epoch milliseconds format). Automatically refreshed with each edit. Set to 0 for newly added comments.

See the following JSON request and response body examples:

  • JSON request body example: 
    {
        "IsSystem": false,
        "Body": "Updated comment1!",
        "AttachmentIds": [],
        "PrivacyType": "PUBLIC",
        "Submitter": {
                "UserId": "10015"
        },
        "ActualInterface": "API",  
        "CommentFrom": "User", 
        "CommentTo": "", 
        "FunctionalPurpose": "StatusUpdate",
        "Media": "Unknown"
}
  • JSON response body example: 
    {
"IsSystem": false,
"Body": "Updated comment1!",
"PrivacyType": "PUBLIC",
"Submitter": {
"UserId": "10016"
},
"UpdatedBy": {
"UserId": "10015"
},
"ActualInterface": "API",
"CommentFrom": "User",
"FunctionalPurpose": "StatusUpdate",
"Media": "Unknown",
"CreateTime": 1451360022122,
"UpdateTime": 1754277600000,
"Id":  "4e384ac9dade100604e4e1a55466e20931ac"
}

Delete comment

Use this API to delete a specific comment from a record. To use this API, you must know the comment ID. The value of the comment ID is returned by the API when the comment is first added to a record.

To delete existing comments of a record, you must have Comments permission for the relevant record type.

Request URI: https://<serverAddress>/rest/<tenant-id>/collaboration/comments/<EntityType>/<EntityId>/<CommentId>

Method: DELETE

Path parameters:

  • <EntityType>: Specifies the record type.
  • <EntityId>: Specifies the required record.
  • <CommentId>: Specifies the ID of the comment to delete.

Request body parameters: Request body is not applicable to this request

Response body parameters: No response body is returned by this API.
